00026 template <typename TYPE>
00027 class SimpleRecycleList : public SimpleList<TYPE>
00028 {
00029  public:
00031   SimpleRecycleList();
00032   
00034   virtual ~SimpleRecycleList();
00035   
00037   static void DeleteTheAvailableCells()
00038     { 
00039       SimpleListElement<TYPE>* tmp;
00040       while(availableCells != NULL)
00041         {
00042           tmp = availableCells;
00043           availableCells = availableCells->NextElement;
00044           delete tmp;
00045         }
00046     }
00047  protected:
00053         SimpleListElement<TYPE>* GetNewSimpleListElement() const;
00054 
00060         void ReleaseSimpleListElement(SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt) const
00061           { AddAvailableCells(elt); }
00062 
00063  private:
00067         static void AddAvailableCells(SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt)
00068           {
00069             mutexAvailable.EnterMutex();
00070             elt->NextElement = availableCells;
00071             availableCells = elt;
00072             mutexAvailable.LeaveMutex();
00073           }
00074 
00077         static SimpleListElement<TYPE>* ExtractAvailableCells()
00078           {
00079             SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt = NULL;
00080             mutexAvailable.EnterMutex();
00081             if(availableCells != NULL)
00082               {
00083                 elt = availableCells;
00084                 availableCells = availableCells->NextElement;
00085               }
00086             mutexAvailable.LeaveMutex();
00087             return elt;
00088           }
00090         static SimpleListElement<TYPE>* availableCells;
00092         static ReentrantMutex mutexAvailable;
00093 };

00110 SimpleListElement<TYPE>* SimpleRecycleList<TYPE>::GetNewSimpleListElement() const
00111 {
00112   SimpleListElement<TYPE>* elt = ExtractAvailableCells();
00113   if(elt == NULL)
00114     {
00115       elt = new SimpleListElement<TYPE>;
00116     }
00117   return elt;
00118 }
